titleInfo.title: Story Hour at the National Home for Jewish Children in Denver

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#388 Residents of Nat. Home for Jewish Children'' and ''Jewish Sheltering Home 1910-1950s''. On back of photograph: ''Story hour in the nursery National Home for Jewish Children at Denver 1931. #388 Credit: National Jewish Hospital Collection Beck Archives, Univ. of Denver''.

mods.abstract: An unidentified woman reads a story to a group of children in the nursery at the National Home for Jewish Children at Denver, which later became part of the National Jewish Hospital.
mods.note: Donated by the National Asthma Center.

name.namePart: National Home for Jewish Children in Denver

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
